name: The Hallway of Horror
description:
This is a short horror experience that all takes place in a the same Hallway. Very much inspired by the old PT demo. Feel free to leave a comment if you find any bugs or just liked the game!

Download Instructions

1. Download Zipped Folder

2. Extract Files to Separate Location

3. Run "TheHallway.exe", but it might just appear as "TheHallway"

Controls:

W,A,S,D - Move around

Mouse- Look around

E - Interact
